entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [SourceLink] Race condition in Metadata As Source Service #57353
  • [SourceLink] Output window logging #57352
  • [SourceLink] Ensure source file found on disk matches compiled DLL #57351
  • [SourceLink] Ensure embedded source is shown with the right encoding #57350
  • Inconsistent order of evaluation between indexing with System.Index and System.Range #57349
  • Regression: String.IsNullOrEmpty does not resolve nullable IDE/compiler warning #57348
  • Roslyn generated executables cannot be run without the dotnet command #57347

PullRequests

Created

  • adding draft of detailed spec #57346
    Area-IDE
  • DecisionDagBuilder.CheckConsistentDecision - Improve relationship check for tests under examination. #57345
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57355
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #57354
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Compute val escape for list patterns #57336
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [WIP] Use cached delegate instances for method group conversions #6642
    Language-C#, Area-Compilers, Blocked, cla-already-signed, Community
